### Tender Details

*   **English**: Request for Proposal
*   **French**: Demande de propositions

*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Tender Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking proposals for the supply, delivery, installation (including training), and maintenance of two (2) Digital Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) Systems for the Calgary and Scarborough laboratories. The instruments will be used for diagnostic microbiology and food fraud testing.

### Tender Information

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-01-10
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-01-31
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Calgary, Alberta
*   **Contact Information**:

    Tanya Gostev (SPAC/PSPC)
    tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Misinformation

There was an amendment to the tender closing time. All proposals must be submitted by December 2, 2022, at 2:00 pm Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) to be considered responsive.

### Technical Specifications

The Digital PCR Systems will be used for the partitioned amplification and quantification of up to four target DNA sequences extracted from raw and processed food products.
